priceImpactDescription: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size
liquidityProviderFeeDescription: A portion of each trade (0.25%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive
confirmSwapHint: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than 0.5%. your transaction will revert.
notFoundWallet: Not Found Wallet, please install math wallet!
addWallet: Not Found Wallet, please create a wallet!
noLiquidity: No liquidity found. You can provide liquidity by click Add Liquidity button below.
liquidityProviderEarn: Liquidity Providers earn 0.3% of all trades on this pair proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, and can be claimed by withdrawing liquidity.
depositTip: Deposit your Liquidity Provider tokens to receive CLV, the Clover protocol governance token.
